props.name: as
props.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwritten by asChild.

props.name: asChild
props.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.

props.name: defaultOpen
props.description: The open state of the collapsible when it is initially rendered. <br> Use when you do not need to control its open state.

props.name: disabled
props.description: When true, prevents the user from interacting with the collapsible.

props.name: open
props.description: The controlled open state of the collapsible. Can be binded with v-model.

props.name: unmountOnHide
props.description: When true, the element will be unmounted on closed state.
